newsletterCTA.title: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive news about AsyncAPI.
newsletterCTA.subtitle: We respect your inbox. No spam, promise ✌️
newsletterCTA.errorSubtitle: Subscription failed, please let us know about it by submitting a bug

newsroomSection.title: Latest news and blogs
newsroomSection.description: Welcome to our Newsroom section. Here, you'll get latest information about our blogs, articles, announcements and Youtube live-streams. Let's get upto date with the recent activities in the organization.

calendar.title: Upcoming events
calendar.noMeetingsMessage: There are no meetings scheduled for next few days. You can check upcoming events by clicking the button below.
